thread.title: Central London hotel
thread.title_full: Central London hotel - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: jaffa105
title: Central London hotel
text:
Excellent location.Easy walk across Westminster or Waterloo Bridges to central London. Room was all you need after a day in London - clean, spacious, with a comfortable bed and surprisingly very quiet. Hotel happy to look after luggage prior to check-in time and after check out time so allowing customers to make the most of their time in the capital.. Only disappointment was the continental breakfast which on one day was badly stocked and lacked several items. We complained and were reimbursed.
Room Tip: Our room at back of hotel only had a view of a wall but was amazingly quiet. See more room tips
